data.trans_hint: Đại dịch bùng phát cách đây hai năm.
data.en_hint: The pandemic broke out two years ago.
data.content_game_1: The pandemic broke out two years ago.
data.answer_en_hint: The pandemic broke out two years ago.

data.trans: Tàn lụi, tắt dần, tan biến đi
data.trans_hint: Tiếng cười của anh ấy tắt dần.
data.en_hint: The sound of his laughter died away.
data.content_game_1: The sound of his laughter died away.
data.answer_en_hint: The sound of his laughter died away.

data.trans: Tắt dần, giảm dần, mờ dần
data.trans_hint: Đừng lo lắng, tin đồn sẽ sớm chìm dần thôi.
data.en_hint: Don't worry, the gossip will soon die down.
data.content_game_1: Don't worry, the gossip will soon die down.
data.answer_en_hint: Don't worry, the gossip will soon die down.

data.trans: Chết sạch, biến mất hoàn toàn, tuyệt chủng
data.trans_hint: Chúng ta từng tin rằng chủ nghĩa tư bản sẽ sớm lụi tàn (biến mất hoàn toàn).
data.en_hint: We used to believe that capitalism would soon die out.
data.content_game_1: We used to believe that capitalism would soon die out.
data.answer_en_hint: We used to believe that capitalism would soon die out.

data.trans_hint: Có một loạt sai sót dẫn đến vụ tai nạn.
data.en_hint: There was a series of errors leading up to the accident.
data.content_game_1: There was a series of errors leading up to the accident.
data.answer_en_hint: There was a series of errors leading up to the accident.

data.trans: Lan tràn, ảnh hưởng đến những thứ khác
data.trans_hint: Tình trạng bất ổn đã ảnh hưởng đến các khu vực bên ngoài thành phố.
data.en_hint: Unrest has spilt over into areas outside the city.
data.content_game_1: Unrest has spilt over into areas outside the city.
data.answer_en_hint: Unrest has spilt over into areas outside the city.

data.trans: Thiêu rụi cái gì đó (tòa nhà, xưởng, nhà máy,..)
data.trans_hint: Tức giận với bạn trai, cô gái đã mang một chai xăng đến nhà của anh ấy và thiêu rụi nó.
data.en_hint: Angry with her boyfriend, the girl brought a bottle of gasoline to his house and burnt it down.
data.content_game_1: Angry with her boyfriend, the girl brought a bottle of gasoline to his house and burnt it down.
data.answer_en_hint: Angry with her boyfriend, the girl brought a bottle of gasoline to his house and burnt it down.

data.trans_hint: Bố mẹ của cậu bé tự tử gần đây đã bị chỉ trích bởi cư dân mạng.
data.en_hint: The parents of the boy who committed suicide recently had to come under fire by the netizens.
data.content_game_1: The parents of the boy who committed suicide recently had to come under fire by the netizens.
data.answer_en_hint: The parents of the boy who committed suicide recently had to come under fire by the netizens.

data.trans_hint: Trong thời điểm nghiêm trọng của đại dịch Covid, lực lượng lớn cảnh sát phải ra đường để đảm bảo không có ai ra đường mà không có giấy đi đường.
data.en_hint: During the critical time of the Covid pandemic, police had to go on the street in force to make sure no one was on the street without authorization letter.
data.content_game_1: During the critical time of the Covid pandemic, police had to go on the street in force to make sure no one was on the street without authorization letter.
data.answer_en_hint: During the critical time of the Covid pandemic, police had to go on the street in force to make sure no one was on the street without authorization letter.

data.trans_hint: Ngay sau cơn bão ngày hôm qua, chính phủ quyết định xây một con đập mới.
data.en_hint: In the wake of yesterday's flood, the government decided to build a new damp.
data.content_game_1: In the wake of yesterday's flood, the government decided to build a new damp.
data.answer_en_hint: In the wake of yesterday's flood, the government decided to build a new damp.

data.trans: Phóng hỏa, đốt cái gì đó
data.trans_hint: Nhóm công nhân phóng hỏa đốt nhà xưởng vì hiểu nhầm với ban quản lý.
data.en_hint: The group of workers set the factory on fire because of some misunderstandings with their management board.
data.content_game_1: The group of workers set the factory on fire because of some misunderstandings with their management board.
data.answer_en_hint: The group of workers set the factory on fire because of some misunderstandings with their management board.

data.trans_hint: Sự sa thải bất hợp lý của một nhân viên vô tội đã gây ra cuộc đình công.
data.en_hint: The unreasonable layoff of an innocent employee sparked off the strike.
data.content_game_1: The unreasonable layoff of an innocent employee sparked off the strike.
data.answer_en_hint: The unreasonable layoff of an innocent employee sparked off the strike.

data.trans: Gây thiệt hại nặng/ phá hủy
data.trans_hint: Nếu không có sự tham gia của cảnh sát, đám thanh niên này sẽ còn tàn phá ngôi làng.
data.en_hint: Had there been no involvement of the police, the youth bangs would have still wreaked havoc to the village.
data.content_game_1: Had there been no involvement of the police, the youth bangs would have still wreaked havoc to the village.
data.answer_en_hint: Had there been no involvement of the police, the youth bangs would have still wreaked havoc to the village.
